title: deadsea33
author: deadsea33
created_time: June 22, 2023, 03:54:23 PMLast edit: June 24, 2023, 06:14:46 AM by deadsea33
content: I found that Pmalek and cygan started a great word game here to give us some fun during the dull dark time of the year. After finishing their great rounds, Started my own word game. Let's move onHere I will post 7 words per round where each word is random or incomplete letter. Search well and arrange those letters correctly.All words associated with bitcoin, cryptocurrency and legendary use names.More than 20 rounds will run.Can participate in the game according to the rules of the game. All forum users can participate in this game.Rules1. Accounts created after 1st June 2023 are not allowed to participate. [ Note : 1 number Rule has been changed. ]2. No cheating, editing, or deleting posts etc won’t be counted.3. You can guess how many times you want, but you aren’t allowed to post again unless someone else writes a post. 4. You can only guess EACH WORD ONCE PER POST. You can’t provide 2 or more answers for the same word, but you are allowed to guess all of the terms.5. If no one can guess the correct word/words, I will add a few more letters.6. Each correct answer the word will be given 1 Merit, For the user who was the fastest.

comments.author: Cantsay

comments.author: deadsea33
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on June 22, 2023, 04:05:36 PM1. ALGORITHMSWithout any rule or what the words are related to we have so many options. Algorithms is correct. Great

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Each member is free to give merit points to any post he deems worthy. But I think it would have been better to send it to posts that are of high quality and benefit the community, including publications that provide assistance to others.It may be a fun game, but I think it is somewhat absurd, and it was possible to help beginners by obtaining merit points by diligently answering questions in the field of bitcoin and blockchain, which will motivate them to research and learn.Moreover, this section is for beginners. I do not know what is the purpose of allowing all ranks to participate.No offense. I just say what comes to my mind honestly, since there is no reason to report the post, since it does not violate the rules of posting on the forum.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: coupable on June 22, 2023, 04:54:50 PMMoreover, this section is for beginners. I do not know what is the purpose of allowing all ranks to participate. I see no problem in the game itself, and I had fun when I ran my own one about two years ago. Regarding the participation of all members, deadsea33 could add the same rule I had back in the day. I gave Newbies and Jr. Members a 24-hour head start to play the game before other ranks could chip in. Doing it that way, they had more time to get some merits. Thinking back to when my game was active, I should have introduced an anti-cygan rule as well but never did.  Seeing that no one wants to guess, let me try just for this round since I got tagged in the OP and saw the game.2. _ _ l _ _ t   _ _ c _wallet hack4. _ _ l _   _ _ r _ _ _bull market
